SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_DEPARTMENT_GETSUBDEPARTMENT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Create the xml for editing the subdepartments.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_UMHS_DEPARTMENT_GETSUBDEPARTMENT(@DEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier) returns table as return ( select ID, NAME, ISINACTIVE, SEQUENCE from dbo.USR_UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT where DEPARTMENTID = @DEPARTMENTID );
